languages.text: "Мы называем их Первыми Мирами. Они появились задолго до моего рождения, еще тогда, когда все эльдары были единым народом и имели собственную империю, простирающуюся от края до края галактики. Мир-Первых-Звезд. Мир-Без-Греха. Не думала, что однажды отыщу один из них".

traits.locale_text: "Мы называем их Первыми Мирами. Они появились задолго до моего рождения, еще тогда, когда все эльдары были едим народом и имели собственную имерию, простирающуюся от края до края галактики. Мир-Первых-Звезд. Мир-Без-Греха. Не думала, что однажды отыщу один из них".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "We call planets such as this one Crone Worlds. They came to be long before my time, back when all of the Aeldari were a united people whose empire stretched from one edge of the galaxy to the other. It is a World Beneath the First Stars. An Unblighted World. I never thought that I would come to find one."
languages.original_text: "Мы называем их Первыми Мирами. Они появились задолго до моего рождения, еще тогда, когда все эльдары были единым народом и имели собственную империю, простирающуюся от края до края галактики. Мир-Первых-Звезд. Мир-Без-Греха. Не думала, что однажды отыщу один из них".

traits.locale_text: "We call planets such as this one Crone Worlds. They came to be long before my time, back when all of the Aeldari were a united people whose empire stretched from one edge of the galaxy to the other. It is a World Beneath the First Stars. An Unblighted World. I never thought that I would come to find one."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「我らはこのような惑星を老朽惑星と呼んでいる。我が生まれるよりはるか前、全アエルダリが銀河の端から端まで広がる帝国で一丸となっていた時代までさかのぼる。最初の星々の支配下にある星。荒廃していない星。まさかこの目で見ることになろうとは」
languages.original_text: "We call planets such as this one Crone Worlds. They came to be long before my time, back when all of the Aeldari were a united people whose empire stretched from one edge of the galaxy to the other. It is a World Beneath the First Stars. An Unblighted World. I never thought that I would come to find one."

traits.locale_text: 「我らはこのような惑星を老朽惑星と呼んでいる。我が生まれるよりはるか前、全アエルダリが銀河の端から端まで広がる帝国で一丸となっていた時代までさかのぼる。最初の星々の支配下にある星。荒廃していない星。まさかこの目で見ることになろうとは」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “像这样的行星，我们称之为‘老妪世界’。早在我的时代之前，这些世界就已经存在了。那个时候，艾达灵族还是个团结的种族，我们的帝国从银河系一端延伸到另一端。这个世界是最初恒星照耀下的世界，是从未被玷污过的世界。我从没想到，居然还能找到这样的世界。”
languages.original_text: "We call planets such as this one Crone Worlds. They came to be long before my time, back when all of the Aeldari were a united people whose empire stretched from one edge of the galaxy to the other. It is a World Beneath the First Stars. An Unblighted World. I never thought that I would come to find one."

traits.locale_text: “像这样的行星，我们称之为‘老妪世界’。早在我的时代之前，这些世界就已经存在了。那个时候，艾达灵族还是个团结的种族，我们的帝国从银河系一端延伸到另一端。这个世界是最初恒星照耀下的世界，是从未被玷污过的世界。我从没想到，居然还能找到这样的世界。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Nous appelons les planètes comme celles-ci des mondes déchus. Elles existaient déjà lorsque les Aeldaris formaient un peuple uni dont l'empire dominait toute la galaxie. C'est un monde sous les premières étoiles. Un monde épargné par le fléau. Je n'aurais jamais cru en trouver un jour. »
languages.original_text: "We call planets such as this one Crone Worlds. They came to be long before my time, back when all of the Aeldari were a united people whose empire stretched from one edge of the galaxy to the other. It is a World Beneath the First Stars. An Unblighted World. I never thought that I would come to find one."

traits.locale_text: « Nous appelons les planètes comme celles-ci des mondes déchus. Elles existaient déjà lorsque les Aeldaris formaient un peuple uni dont l'empire dominait toute la galaxie. C'est un monde sous les premières étoiles. Un monde épargné par le fléau. Je n'aurais jamais cru en trouver un jour. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Llamamos a los planetas como este mundos ancestrales. Nacieron mucho antes de mi época, cuando todos los Aeldari eran aún un pueblo unido cuyo imperio se extendía a todos los bordes de la galaxia. Es un mundo bajo las primeras estrellas. Un mundo puro. Nunca imaginé que pudiera encontrar uno».
languages.original_text: "We call planets such as this one Crone Worlds. They came to be long before my time, back when all of the Aeldari were a united people whose empire stretched from one edge of the galaxy to the other. It is a World Beneath the First Stars. An Unblighted World. I never thought that I would come to find one."

traits.locale_text: «Llamamos a los planetas como este mundos ancestrales. Nacieron mucho antes de mi época, cuando todos los Aeldari eran aún un pueblo unido cuyo imperio se extendía a todos los bordes de la galaxia. Es un mundo bajo las primeras estrellas. Un mundo puro. Nunca imaginé que pudiera encontrar uno».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Wir nennen solche Planeten Hexenwelten. Sie sind lange vor meiner Zeit entstanden, als alle Aeldari noch ein vereintes Volk waren, dessen Reich sich von einem Ende der Galaxie bis zum anderen erstreckte. Es ist eine Welt zwischen den ersten Sternen. Eine Unverseuchte Welt. Ich hätte nie gedacht, dass ich mal eine finden würde."
languages.original_text: "We call planets such as this one Crone Worlds. They came to be long before my time, back when all of the Aeldari were a united people whose empire stretched from one edge of the galaxy to the other. It is a World Beneath the First Stars. An Unblighted World. I never thought that I would come to find one."

traits.locale_text: "Wir nennen solche Planeten Hexenwelten. Sie sind lange vor meiner Zeit entstanden, als alle Aeldari noch ein vereintes Volk waren, dessen Reich sich von einem Ende der Galaxie bis zum anderen erstreckte. Es eine Welt zwischen den ersten Sternen. Eine Unverseuchte Welt. Ich hätte nie gedacht, dass ich mal eine finden würde."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Bunun gibi gezegenlere Acuze Dünya deriz. Bu dünyalar, benden çok daha önce var olagelmiştir. O zamanlar Aeldari halkı bir bütündü. İmparatorluğumuz, galaksinin bir ucundan ötekine kadar uzanırdı. Burası, İlk Yıldızların Altındaki Dünyalardan biridir. Afetsiz Dünya'dır. Bu dünyalardan birine rastlayacağımı sanmazdım."
languages.original_text: "We call planets such as this one Crone Worlds. They came to be long before my time, back when all of the Aeldari were a united people whose empire stretched from one edge of the galaxy to the other. It is a World Beneath the First Stars. An Unblighted World. I never thought that I would come to find one."

traits.locale_text: "Bunun gibi gezegenlere Acuze Dünya deriz. Bu dünyalar, benim dönemimden çok daha önceydi... O zamanlar, Aeldari halkı bir bütündü. İmparatorluk'umuz, galaksinin bir ucundan ötekine kadar uzanırdı. Burası, İlk Yıldızların Altındaki Dünyalardan biri. Afetsiz Dünyalardan biri. Bu dünyalardan birine rastlamayı hiç beklemezdim."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
